attributes.action: For carers to be noticed and recognised by the government
attributes.additional_details: This is felt that us carers are being ignored.
attributes.background: It is felt by many carers that they are ignored when caring for loved ones at the most difficult time in their life. We carers request that we are recognised for the excellent and difficult jobs that we do.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to recongnise carers, but we're not sure exactly what you want the Government to actually do

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create an Emergency Carers Support Fund to increase care worker wages: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561831

Increase Carers Allowance to equal 35hrs at National Minimum Wage: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579692

Create an nationally recognised card for carers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570980
